name: Quiz App
par: I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the project. Questions are organized into a series of objec. After loading the page and clicking on the new questions button, five new questions will be selected by random permutation and displayed to the user.

name: Flower shop App
par: In this one, I showed the use of the form in the web shop to collect data from the user, recalculate and then display those results to the user.

name: Movie Search App
par: This application allows searching movies, from a json file. It was made in ReactJS and CSS.

name: To do  App
par: This is a CRUD application. I used ReactJS and local storage in the implementation.

name: Knitting
par: This project is a presentation type page. I used HTML, SASS, bootstrap, JQuery.
